Room.Name: Main Kitchen
Room.ShortDescription: You are in the main kitchen used to prepare meals for the mages and guests.
Room.LongDescription: The main kitchen is not only used to prepare meals, but is also the main wine storage area and meat freezer. Cocktails, refreshments and food are prepared for delivery to the main dining hall or to the guests throughout the mansion. The door to the west takes you back into the main hall. There is a freezer to the south that holds all the meats so that they don't spoil.
